name: FoscamCamera
0:
”Alexa, show me the doorway”
”Alexa, show me the bedroom”
”Alexa, show me the babyroom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Foscam cameras are designed to help you look after your home and family in a more convenient and smarter way – even when you’re away.With the Foscam Skill and Alexa, you can now access your Foscam Camera via voice control by simply saying "Alexa,show me the Doorway."

Before you get started, please make sure your Foscam device is online and updated to the latest firmware. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button to link your Foscam account and discover your Foscam cameras. 

After linking your Foscam account and discovering your Foscam cameras in your Alexa account, you can start controlling your cameras. 

To look the camera of the Doorway, you can say: 
“Alexa, show me the Doorway.” 

Compatible Foscam Cameras: 
R2M/R2C V2/FI9902P/FI9912P/G2/G2EP/FI9912EP/GJ2/D2EP/FI9961EP V4
 Firmware version：2.x.2.38 or higher;

FI9901EP/FI9928P/R2/R4/FI9900P/C2/FI9926P/FI9900EP
 Firmware version：2.x.1.77 or higher;

G4P/G4/R4M/R4S/G4EP/QJ4
 Firmware version：2.x.2.37 or higher;

C2M/X1/X2
 Firmware version：2.x.2.10 or higher;

Compatible Foscam App:
The Foscam app version should be 2.2.9 or higher.

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices: 
-Echo Show 

How to connect Foscam camera with Amazon Alexa:
https://www.foscam.com/video/index.html?id=95

*When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. The name is equivalent to the location of where the camera was installed and can be found and configured in the Foscam app. You can also add Foscam cameras to new or existing groups in the Alexa app.
